title: Talking About Hobbies
description: Listen to a conversation about hobbies and free time activities.

audio.text:
A: So, what do you like to do in your free time, Mina?
B: I have a few hobbies. I really enjoy photography. I like taking pictures of nature, especially flowers and landscapes.
A: That sounds interesting! Do you have a good camera?
B: Yes, I bought one last year. I'm still learning, but I'm getting better. What about you? Do you have any hobbies?
A: Well, I like playing sports. I play basketball twice a week with my friends.
B: That's cool! I'm not very good at sports, actually.
A: I also started learning to play the guitar recently. It's quite difficult, but I enjoy practicing.
B: Really? I've always wanted to learn an instrument. Is it hard?
A: It's challenging at first, but there are many online tutorials. I practice about 30 minutes every day.
B: Maybe I should try learning something new too. I've been thinking about joining a yoga class.
A: You should! It's a great way to relax after work. My sister does yoga and she loves it.
B: Good idea. I'll look for a beginner class near my home.
